data.name: Fernbus Simulator - Top Class DD
data.detailed_description: The Top Class DD expands your fleet with a high-quality double-decker bus. This coach combines luxury with comfort on two floors. Despite its size, the Top Class DD is easy to operate and makes every journey a relaxing experience.
data.about_the_game: The Top Class DD expands your fleet with a high-quality double-decker bus. This coach combines luxury with comfort on two floors. Despite its size, the Top Class DD is easy to operate and makes every journey a relaxing experience.
data.short_description: This DLC includes the Top Class DD. A luxury double-decker bus for Fernbus Coach Simulator
data.supported_languages:
English, German*, French, Polish, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese, Turkish, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Swedish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Finnish, Dutch, Arabic
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Processor or similar with at least 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 or similar AMD Radeon (no support for onboard cards)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Processor or similar with at least 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 780 or AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Installation on a SSD is recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
